__e: It was the scariest, happiest moment of my life.
It's completely shocking, and on the other side you just basically realize that that has actually been the story of the world forever.
Of course, it's just... It's been a bloody day and I'm dead on my feet.
From what I understand, it's... quite an excruciating way to die.
Think that your babes were sweeter than they were... ..And he that slew them fouler than he is!
But once the high wears off, it is more gruesome than you could realize.
The master's going to do the most awful ridiculous thing he's done in his life.
You know, after a day of doing whatever horrible, awful thing you got to do to make money, you need a place to go where it's quiet and you can just remember who you really are.
But that's because we're the future and there's nothing scarier than that.
